mapper.sql: variant_key, gene_key, variant_id, gene_id, grch, genomic_position, aa_mutation, cds_mutation, variant_type, cosmic_id, dbsnp_id, mutation_effect, oncogenicity, remark, mutation_detection, created_at, created_way, created_by_key, created_by_name, check_state, check_report, checked_by_key, checked_by_name, translate_by_key, translate_by_name
mapper.insert: insert into kt_variant (variant_key, gene_key, variant_id, gene_id, grch, genomic_position, aa_mutation, cds_mutation, variant_type, cosmic_id, dbsnp_id, mutation_effect, oncogenicity, remark, mutation_detection, created_at, created_way, created_by_key, created_by_name, check_state, check_report, checked_by_key, checked_by_name, translate_by_key, translate_by_name) values (#{variantKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{geneKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{variantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{geneId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{grch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{genomicPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{aaMutation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cdsMutation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{variantType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cosmicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dbsnpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mutationEffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oncogenicity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mutationDetection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createdWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createdByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkState,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{checkReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{translateByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{translateByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update kt_variant
gene_key = #{geneKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
variant_id = #{variantId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
gene_id = #{geneId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
grch = #{grch,jdbcType=INTEGER},
genomic_position = #{genomicPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
aa_mutation = #{aaMutation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cds_mutation = #{cdsMutation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
variant_type = #{variantType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
cosmic_id = #{cosmicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dbsnp_id = #{dbsnpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mutation_effect = #{mutationEffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
oncogenicity = #{oncogenicity,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mutation_detection = #{mutationDetection,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT},
created_way = #{createdWay,jdbcType=INTEGER},
created_by_key = #{createdByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_report = #{checkReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
translate_by_key = #{translateByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
translate_by_name = #{translateByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where variant_key = #{variantKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update kt_variant set gene_key = #{geneKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, variant_id = #{variantId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, gene_id = #{geneId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, grch = #{grch,jdbcType=INTEGER}, genomic_position = #{genomicPosition,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, aa_mutation = #{aaMutation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cds_mutation = #{cdsMutation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, variant_type = #{variantType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cosmic_id = #{cosmicId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dbsnp_id = #{dbsnpId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mutation_effect = #{mutationEffect,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oncogenicity = #{oncogenicity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mutation_detection = #{mutationDetection,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, created_at = #{createdAt,jdbcType=BIGINT}, created_way = #{createdWay,jdbcType=INTEGER}, created_by_key = #{createdByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, created_by_name = #{createdByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_report = #{checkReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
translate_by_key = #{translateByKey,jdbcType=CHAR},
translate_by_name = #{translateByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=INTEGER} where variant_key = #{variantKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update kt_variant set check_state = #{checkState,jdbcType=BIGINT}, checked_by_key = #{checkedByKey,jdbcType=CHAR}, checked_by_name = #{checkedByName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, check_report = #{checkReport} where variant_key = #{variantKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select count(variant_key) from kt_variant where check_state=#{checkState} and created_way=#{createdWay}
select count(variant_key) from kt_variant where (created_at BETWEEN #{firstTime} and #{currentTime}) AND check_state=#{checkState} and created_way=#{createdWay}
